articles.title: About
articles.description: I’m Félix Luginbühl, a data analyst, R developer and Shiny app architect.
articles.contents:
You can contact me on LinkedIn and Twitter.
Blogposts
To reproduce the blog posts, you can have a look at my Github repository or try my RStudio server running on Binder.
Side projects
I developed some R packages:
BFS to download data from the Swiss Federal Statistical Office.
aniview to animate any Shiny and R Markdown content.
wikisourcer to download public domain works from Wikisource.
polyglot to learn foreign language vocabulary in the R console.
gotop to add a “scroll to top” icon to R Markdown and Shiny.
rougemont to access all the texts of Denis de Rougemont.
scroller to scroll to any object in your Shiny apps.
textyle to add beautiful text effects in your Shiny apps.
